title: Pixel XL Crashed
content:
Pixel XL crashed and cannot restart. 

The screen does not turn on and I tried several methods to reboot in Safe Mode (long pressing power key, volume key, etc.). Pressing the volume key and power button leads to vibration but the screen remains black. The phone is completely 'bricked'.

The phone crashed while watching a video on Whatsapp.

Please advise recovery method or solution.

Thanks
